publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A Work part of Ethiopian Literature

listWit.witness: EMML no. 303 (20th cent.), fols. 87v-108r: “Miracles of St. Cyriacus [Taʾamra Qirqos]; (EMML II, 4; Church of St. Raphael, quarter of Gulale, Addis Ababā).
EMML no. 615 (1966), fols. 43r-47r: “5 miracles of St. Cyriacus” (EMML II, 364; Church of Qirqos, quarter of Bole, Addis Abäba).

EMML no. 3469 (19th cent.), fols. 20r-26v: “Miracles of Cyriacus”; fols. 62r-69v: “Nine miracles of Cyriacus”
(EMML VIII, 283-284; Church of Šawā Medā Qirqos, Gubbālāfto, Yaǧǧu, Wallo).
EMML no. 4816 (1951/2), fols. 59r-63r: “Miracles of Cyriacus” (EMML X, 324; Church of Dase Madḫāne ʿĀlam, Wallo).
Éthiopien 134 (15th cent.), fol. 28: “Martyre de S. Cyr et sa mère Julitta et des onze mille trente-quatre autres martyrs qui suoffrirent du temps du Tribun Alexandre” (ZotBNat 202).
Éthiopien 339 = Griaule 35 (1932), fols. 28vb-33vb: “Quatre miracles de l´enfant Cyriaque (Qirqos)” (GrébGriaule II, 3-9).

div.label: incipit
div.ab: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ንዌጥን፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ጽሒፈ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምሪሁ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ማር፡ ቂርቆስ፡ ወልደ፡ ቅድስት፡ ኢየሉጣ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሃሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቅርቱ፡ ወለተ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ለዓ[፡] ለዓመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ስምዑ፡ ንንግርክሙ፡ ዘገብረ፡ ተአምረ፡ ወመንክረ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ማር፡ ቂርቆስ፡ በዕለተ፡ ልደቱ፨ (I Miracle) ወነበረ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ ዘአኃዞ፡ ጋኔን፨
